title: [Kung Fu] The Deadly Breaking Sword (1979) - DVD/Rmvb
description:
Plot:	Ti Lung unites with Jackie Chan&#039;s kung-fu comedic rival, Alexander Fu Sheng, to defeat an assassin being "acupuncturingly" controlled by the demented Dr. Kuo. Acclaimed choreographer Tang Chia&#039;s action bits and sight gags are bewitching to behold.

Overview:	The Deadly Breaking Sword elevated director Sun Chung to the martial arts director ranks of Chang Cheh. Starring the incomparable Ti Lung and Jackie Chan&#039;s kung-fu comedic rival Alexander Fu Sheng, acclaimed fight choreographer Tang Chia had a field day increasing the stars&#039; venomous fighting appeal. Armed with the "Deadly Breaking Sword" technique, Tuen Cheng-tsin (Ti Lung) unites with thief Ko Mun (Alexander Fu Sheng) to defeat an assassin being "acupuncturingly" controlled by the evil Dr. Kuo.

Cast: 	Ti Lung  ||  Alexander Fu Sheng  ||  Si Si  ||  Guk Fung (Ku Feng)  ||  Michael Chan (Wai Man)  ||  Lily Li Li-Li  ||  Ngaai Fei  ||  Chan Shen  ||  Kara Hui Ying-Hung  ||  Ha Ping  ||  Austin Wai Tin-Chi  ||  Keung Hon  ||  Eddy Ko Hung  ||  Ng Hong Sang  ||  Yuen Wah  ||  Cheung Gwok Wa  ||  Lam Fai Wong  ||  Jamie Luk (Kim Ming)  ||  Yuen Bun
